remarks.para: Developers must supply a name to that is unique over the scope of the that they supply to . The method takes a string that is the concatenation of (the resolution group name), '.', and the unique name that was supplied to , and returns the specified effect.

example.para: Then the code below will add the effect to a button:
example.code: [var button = new Button { Text = "I have a shadow" }; button.Effects.Add (Effect.Resolve ("com.YourCompany.ShadowEffect"));
